Title: In-vivo longitudinal photoacoustic tomography of the response of colorectal cancer models to vascular targeted therapy
Abstract: © OSA 2016.The assessment of the longitudinal and dose dependent response of mouse models of two human colorectal tumours, to vascular disrupting agent, has been demonstrated in-vivo and non-invasively using photoacoustic imaging.
